name: Ooble
description:
Description

Ooble is a game where you act as a magical pest control personnel attempting to remove an infestation of Oobles from an office. Oobles are little purple pear shaped creatures that are treated as pests as they often inhabit and take over buildings, kicking out humans.

                                                                            An Ooble

Armed with your trusty Ooble collection unit, magical spells, and expertise, it should be quite an easy job to remove them yes? Well it better be because your boss has been extra grumpy lately and one slip-up may cost you your job!

                                                                    The Collection Unit Contributors

Joshua Kennedy – Programmer, Game Designer, Game Mechanics Designer, Systems and Sound Designer

Yusuf Kilic – Game Designer, Level Designer
